attributes.action: reduce the foreign work force of the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The british people have a right to work in their own country but cannot get jobs because of the number of foreigners living and working here. Many british people have  huge debts which they cannot pay off because they cannot get work. Reduce the number of foreign workers and then we can get jobs and pay our debts.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
